title: "We have to harden our schools, not soften them up": Trump
text:
"We have to harden our schools, not soften them up": Trump Thursday, February 22, 2018 - 02:23 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday emphasized that he wants to see trained teachers able to carry concealed guns to ward off potential school shooters, adding that a gun-free zone to a killer is like ''going in for the ice cream.''
